original_text: And leaving the crowd, they took him with them in the boat, just as he was. And other boats were with him.
korean_text: 그들이 무리를 떠나 예수를 배에 계신 그대로 모시고 가매 다른 배들도 함께 하더니

sentences.original_text: they took him with them in the boat,
And other boats were with him.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 다른 배들도 그와 함께 있었다.
